TRACK REPLACEMENT | May 5 - 6 • May 12 - 13, 3:30 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun
[1] No trains between 137 St and 242 St

[A] [C] trains, M3, M100 and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[1] Service operates between South Ferry and 137 St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

[SB] Buses operate along four routes making station stops on the [1] line:
1. Broadway between 242 and 207 Sts, stopping at the 207 St [A] station.
2. Dyckman St between [1] and [A] stations late nights only. Use M100 service days/evenings.
3. St Nicholas Av between 191 and 168 Sts. Free transfer for M3 service.
4. Broadway between 168 and 137 Sts.

Use [A] [C]* service to/from nearby stations in Washington Heights.
